member.name: T:MatthiWare.FinancialModelingPrep.FinancialModelingPrepOptions
member.summary: FMP Options

member.name: P:MatthiWare.FinancialModelingPrep.FinancialModelingPrepOptions.ApiKey
member.summary: Get or set the FMP API Key. You can find your API Key in the dashboard (https://financialmodelingprep.com/developer/docs/dashboard) By default it will use the 'demo' API Key that is limited and not all endpoints will work.

member.name: P:MatthiWare.FinancialModelingPrep.FinancialModelingPrepOptions.MaxRequestPerSecond
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed of requests per second. By default the max allowed is 10. If you have a different rate limit you can configure it here. See Rate Limitation #15 https://financialmodelingprep.com/developer/docs/terms-of-service

member.name: P:MatthiWare.FinancialModelingPrep.FinancialModelingPrepOptions.MaxAPICallsPerMinute
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed API Calls per second. You can find the defaults on the pricing documentation. By default we use the 300 "starter" limit. https://financialmodelingprep.com/developer/docs/pricing
